attributes.action: Give less air time to the Olympic Games and more News coverage to Finding Tia Sharp, missing 12-year old girl
attributes.additional_details:
We all find it personally disgusting that a 12-year old girl, Tia Sharp went missing on Friday 3rd August 2012. Since this time there has been hardly any visible airing of her disappearance due to the current hosting of the Olympic Games.

Please increase the airing and publicity of this child's disappearance!!

rejection.details: Within the framework of the legislation on broadcasting, the broadcasters are editorially independent and there is no provision for Government to intervene in the broadcasters’ day-to-day editorial matters.
